title: Separating Terms
text: Separate the terms so that it forms multiple fractions with the same denominator. It will result in the following: $$\frac{48y^4}{\left(-8y^2\right)}-\frac{24y^3}{\left(-8y^2\right)}$$.
speech: Separate the terms so that it forms multiple fractions with the same denominator. It will result in the following:  fraction, 48 y to the fourth, over, parentheses, negative 8 y squared, ,  minus fraction, 24 y cubed, over, parentheses, negative 8 y squared, ,  .

title: Simplify Terms
text: What is the result once each fraction term is simplified?
